entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chipman
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High 10.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain at times heavy in the morning. Fog patches developing in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 20 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
